messages.messageBody:
Andy,

Thanks very much. This is a very useful link.

Best regards,
Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Andres Pedraza" <apedraza93@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 20, 2013 8:17 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Japanese Kanji


Ed,

It is not that you need additional software, it is that you need to
properly configure your OS, which I assume is Windows.

Hope this helps:

http://www.wikihow.com/Get-Japanese-Characters-%28Kanji,-Hiragana,-Katakana%29-on-Firefox

Best,

Andy

messages.messageBody:
Is there a program out there to convert all of those little squares to
Japanese Kanji - the little squares are the ones with about four numbers in
them that I am sure they represent the Kanji...

thanks, Ed.
